Class SMSGateway


  • public class SMSGateway
    See Also:
    []

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and TypeField and Description
      BooleanIgnoreCertErrors!

      ignore invalid SSL certificates

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SMSGateway(BBjString username$, BBjString password$, BBjString address$)

      public constructor username: the username (has to be enabled for API usage) password: the secret address: the IP address or network name of the SMS Gateway

      SMSGateway(BBjString username$, BBjString password$, BBjString address$, Boolean https!)

      public constructor username: the username (has to be enabled for API usage) password: the secret address: the IP address or network name of the SMS Gateway https: set to true to enforce a secure SSL https

      remark: you can setIgnoreCertErrors(Boolean.TRUE) to accept invalid / self signed certs

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      BBjStringsend(BBjString to$, BBjString text$)

      send a message by SMS to: the recipient's cell number text: the text message to send

      BBjStringsend(BBjString to$, BBjString text$, BBjString mode$)

      send a message to: the recipient's cell number text: the text message to send mode: sending mode, currently supports "number" for SMS "telegram" for Telegram "auto" to first try Telegram then fall back to SMS

    • Field Detail

      • IgnoreCertErrors!

        public Boolean IgnoreCertErrors!

        ignore invalid SSL certificates

        public SMSGateway(BBjString username$, BBjString password$, BBjString address$, Boolean https!)

        public constructor username: the username (has to be enabled for API usage) password: the secret address: the IP address or network name of the SMS Gateway https: set to true to enforce a secure SSL https

        remark: you can setIgnoreCertErrors(Boolean.TRUE) to accept invalid / self signed certs
